EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different Builds: Reminders!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Mexico Volunteers,
It has been such a pleasure getting to know some of you as you prepare for your trip! Thank you for all the emails and phone calls - we're always happy to answer your questions.
A few reminders...
Payment Deadline:
There are 4 weeks left to fund raise for your trip. Remember to share your Canada Helps page with friends and family.
$1,495 is due June 1st, 2016
Book Your Flights!:
When booking flights, please book them to San Diego, CA.
Airport: San Diego - Airport Code: SAN Dates: August 2 - 11, 2015
Once you have booked your flights, please forward me the flight itinerary that your airline sent you.
Travel Health Insurance:
Please provide me with the following information:
Insurance Provider
Policy #
Phone numbers
Thank you to those who have already sent in the above information!
Do you know anyone who is thinking of joining you in Mexico this summer? We have spots left!
Please have them contact me soon.
Live Different Store
We're very excited to introduce to you our Live Different store! http://store.livedifferent.com
What's the best part about purchasing a t-shirt? The proceeds of Live Different's merchandise sales go directly towards our charitable projects.
Thank you and have a great day!
Joy Yu
Program Administrator
